name: Cell Stop
description:
I made this game for the Times NIE competition. This game was made in about 7-10 days. I made all the art, sound effects, and code myself. 

The music is a public domain soundtrack from this OpenGameArt page
https://opengameart.org/content/happy-arcade-tune

I hope you like the game and rate it how much you think is fair

Controls:-

You can use the left and right arrow keys to move and the "Z" key to jump and also go to the next dialogue

You can use the "X" key to skip the cutscenes
